We are automata. If you talk to us, we will repeat the same sentences over and over again.
However, some of us have gained... say, additional abilities, over time.

However, those robots went mad once the disease hit them. They are like zombies now.
You look just like them, but how come you are not mad?

A thousand years ago people wor- shipped a giant floating eye, a god who promised to protect her people from evil.
However, one day people decided they need a god no longer. They built a huge flying palace to rival their god.
But people had underestimated the power of their god. A few years later everyone was gone.
But the palace... it is still there, soaring the skies.
